title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 13, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 13, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Couchdb
items.content_text:
### Related Projects / Hosting

*   [RxDB](https://rxdb.info/) - NoSQL-database for JavaScript Applications. RxDB provides modules for realtime replication with any CouchDB compliant endpoint and also with custom GraphQL endpoints.
items.content_html:
Related Projects / Hosting

  • RxDB - NoSQL-database for JavaScript Applications. RxDB provides modules for realtime replication with any CouchDB compliant endpoint and also with custom GraphQL endpoints.

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Boilerplate / Mouse Events

*   [cra-template-redux-auth-starter (‚≠ê36)](https://github.com/Nilanth/cra-template-redux-auth-starter) - A Redux auth starter boilerplate for CRA.

### Integrations with Third Party Services / Mouse Events

*   [react-slack-notification (‚≠ê15)](https://github.com/Nilanth/react-slack-notification) - Send messages and error logs to a Slack channel directly.
items.content_html:

items.title: Alternative Internet
items.content_text:
### Social Networks

*   [Yarn.social](https://yarn.social) üß∂ is a decentralized self-hosted social media that has a privacy-first focus. There are no ads, no tracking and no personal information is ever collected or stored. Web and Mobile `Go` `MIT`
items.content_html:
Social Networks

  • Yarn.social üß∂ is a decentralized self-hosted social media that has a privacy-first focus. There are no ads, no tracking and no personal information is ever collected or stored. Web and Mobile Go MIT

items.title: Awesome Slack
items.content_text:
### :pencil: ¬† Lists

*   [Community-Built Libraries](https://api.slack.com/community) - Slack-curated list of community open-source libraries
*   [Slack App Directory](https://slack.com/apps) - Official directory of publicly available Slack apps

### :art: ¬† Themes

*   [Slack Themes](http://slackthemes.net/) - A Slack sidebar theme browser
*   [Sweet Themes Are Made of These](http://sweetthemesaremadeofthe.se/) - Website for sharing Slack custom palettes

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / C#

*   [margiebot (‚≠ê123)](https://github.com/jammerware/margiebot) - A .NET library designed to make building bots for Slack fast, easy, and fun
*   [Slack.Webhooks (‚≠ê172)](https://github.com/nerdfury/Slack.Webhooks) - A library to work with Slack webhooks more easily
*   [SlackAPI (‚≠ê454)](https://github.com/Inumedia/SlackAPI) - A third-party implementation of Slack's API written in C#

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Java

*   [java-slack-sdk (‚≠ê587)](https://github.com/slackapi/java-slack-sdk) - Slack's official Java framework for building Slack apps

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Java

*   [simple-slack-api (‚≠ê471)](https://github.com/Ullink/simple-slack-api) - A Slack client library in Java

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / JavaScript/TypeScript

*   [bolt-js (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/slackapi/bolt-js) - Slack's official JavaScript framework for building Slack apps
*   [jsx-slack (‚≠ê480)](https://github.com/yhatt/jsx-slack) - Build JSON object for Slack Block Kit surfaces from JSX
*   [node-slack-sdk (‚≠ê3.3k)](https://github.com/slackapi/node-slack-sdk) - Slack's official SDK for Node.js
*   [slack-block-builder (‚≠ê597)](https://github.com/raycharius/slack-block-builder) - Lightweight Node.js library for building Slack Block Kit UIs, with a declarative syntax inspired by SwiftUI

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / PHP

*   [SlackBundle (‚≠ê39)](https://github.com/DZunke/SlackBundle) - SlackBundle for Symfony2
*   [slack-php-app-framework (‚≠ê48)](https://github.com/slack-php/slack-php-app-framework) - Robust PHP framework for building Slack apps in PHP
*   [slack-php-block-kit (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/jeremeamia/slack-block-kit) - Fluent interface for composing Slack Block Kit messages and modals in PHP
*   [slack-php-socket-mode (‚≠ê10)](https://github.com/slack-php/slack-php-socket-mode) - A Socket Mode implementation for [slack-php-app-framework (‚≠ê48)](https://github.com/slack-php/slack-php-app-framework)
*   [slack-php-slick (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/slack-php/slack-php-slick) - Dependency-free micro-framework for building Slack apps in PHP

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Python

*   [blockkit (‚≠ê84)](https://github.com/imryche/blockkit) - A fast way to build Block Kit interfaces in Python
*   [bolt-python (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/slackapi/bolt-python) - Slack's official Python framework for building Slack apps
*   [python-slack-events-api (‚≠ê345)](https://github.com/slackapi/python-slack-events-api) - Slack Events API adapter for Python
*   [python-slack-sdk (‚≠ê3.9k)](https://github.com/slackapi/python-slack-sdk) - Slack's official SDK for Python
*   [slackblocks (‚≠ê68)](https://github.com/nicklambourne/slackblocks) - Python API for building Slack Block Kit messages
*   [slack-php-api (‚≠ê245)](https://github.com/jolicode/slack-php-api) - PHP Slack client based on the official OpenAPI specification

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Python

*   [slacker-cli (‚≠ê184)](https://github.com/juanpabloaj/slacker-cli) - Messages to slack from the command line
*   [tasks-app (‚≠ê100)](https://github.com/slackapi/tasks-app) - Simple task management app produced by Slack
*   [slackbot (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/lins05/slackbot) - A chat bot for Slack
*   [wee-slack (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/rawdigits/wee-slack) - A WeeChat plugin for Slack

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Ruby

*   [slack-ruby-block-kit (‚≠ê74)](https://github.com/CGA1123/slack-ruby-block-kit) - A ruby wrapper for Slack's Block Kit
*   [slack-ruby-bot-server (‚≠ê268)](https://github.com/slack-ruby/slack-ruby-bot-server) - Ruby library for building Slack applications

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Rust

*   [slack-morphism-rust (‚≠ê193)](https://github.com/abdolence/slack-morphism-rust) - A modern async Slack API client for Rust

### :hammer_and_wrench: ¬† Libraries and SDKs / Swift

*   [SwiftBlocksUI (‚≠ê70)](https://github.com/SwiftBlocksUI/SwiftBlocksUI/) - Interactive Slack messages and modals using a SwiftUI-like declarative style

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / CoffeeScript

*   [jinora (‚≠ê87)](https://github.com/sdslabs/jinora) - Slack webhook app to create anonymous public channels

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / JavaScript/Typescript

*   [definition-app (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/slackapi/definition-app) - App for storing and accessing company-specific phrases
*   [slack-github-action (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/slackapi/slack-github-action) - Send data into Slack using this GitHub Action
*   [slack-reporting-tool (‚≠ê16)](https://github.com/slackapi/slack-reporting-tool) - App that allows team members to report offensive messages
*   [tesla-slack (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/heikkipora/tesla-slack) - Track your Tesla from Slack

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / PHP

*   [MantisBT-Slack (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/infojunkie/MantisBT-Slack) - MantisBT plugin to send bug updates to Slack
*   [monolog (‚≠ê21k)](https://github.com/Seldaek/monolog) - Sends your logs to Slack

### :gear: ¬† Open-Source Slack Apps and Integrations / Ruby

*   [slack-gamebot (‚≠ê130)](https://github.com/dblock/slack-gamebot) - A game bot for Slack
*   [snarkov (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/gesteves/snarkov) - Sinatra-based Markov bot for Slack
*   [tickbot (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/barryf/tickbot) - Simple team time tracking reminder
*   [trebekbot (‚≠ê159)](https://github.com/gesteves/trebekbot) - A Jeopardy! bot for Slack
items.content_html:

  • Slack App Directory - Official directory of publicly available Slack apps

items.title: Awesome Translations
items.content_text:
### Tools / Libraries and tools for developers

*   [WPML](https://wpml.org/) - A WordPress plugin that allows running multilingual websites with a single WordPress install.
items.content_html:
Tools / Libraries and tools for developers

  • WPML - A WordPress plugin that allows running multilingual websites with a single WordPress install.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Games & Comics

- API: [PlayerDB](https://playerdb.co/)

  Description: Query Minecraft, Steam and XBox Accounts

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown



### Transportation

- API: [Sabre for Developers](https://developer.sabre.com/guides/travel-agency/quickstart/getting-started-in-travel)

  Description: Travel Search - Limited usage

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Unknown
items.content_html:
Games & Comics

  • API: PlayerDB

    Description: Query Minecraft, Steam and XBox Accounts

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown

Transportation

  • API: Sabre for Developers

    Description: Travel Search - Limited usage

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Unknown
